directions.step:
Melt butter and mix in sugar, then mix all other ingredients together. Bring to a boil, cut back heat and simmer, stirring constantly, for 8-10 minutes, or until desired consistency is reached.
Source "Nothing makes a soup moment like a rainy day" By ANN BURGER, Post and Courier Food Editor, Sun, 08-Feb-1998. http://www.charleston.net/pub/entertain/cookin/soup0208.htm
Notes: Linda says she has a great barbecue sauce recipe that her father-in-law shared. If you want a milder sauce, you can cut the amounts of red and black pepper in half.
Recipe by: Linda Mercer's father in law
